title: Recent ALICE results relevant for PDFs at low and high-$x$, saturation
abstract:
We present recent results from the ALICE Collaboration on the study of
coherent and incoherent J/$\psi$ photoproduction in ultra-peripheral Pb-Pb
collisions, including results from exclusive and dissociate J/$\psi$ mesons in
ultra-peripheral p-Pb interactions. These measurements provide unique insights
into the initial state of protons and ions, with great sensitivity for both
gluon saturation and shadowing. Furthermore, we will discuss the prospects for
these measurements using the Run 3 and Run 4 data.
